Hi
Sorry, have a few questions for those who are better at computers than I am
Im trying to download films and tv series, it take ages and most of the time I only get the sound and no picture! What am I doing wrong? Once it worked though. Second question; maybe a bit stupid but... how do I "seed"? I dont want to leech but Im not sure where in my computer I have to put things for others to find em... Thanx a lot!

JuJu: Slow downloads could be caused by being behind a router.
I'd recommend getting started by reading up at Slyck:
http://www.slyck.com/bt.php
Playback issues could be related to the codec used to encode the video, usually Xvid or DivX.  Try a player such as VLC which includes just about everything you need:
http://www.videolan.org/vlc/
Good Luck.
